contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|flint}} '''[[Flint]]''' is a type of rock. '''Flint''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == * [[Flint (surname)]] == Fictional characters == * [[Flint (comics)]], a character in the ''Wildstorm'' universe (see ''StormWatch'') * [[Flint (G.I. Joe)]], a character in the G.I. Joe universe * [[Flint (Mother 3)]], a playable character in Nintendo's ''Mother 3'' * [[Flint Fireforge]], a dwarf in the ''Dragonlance'' chronicles * Flint Hammerhead from ''[[Flint the Time Detective]]'' * [[Sandman (Marvel Comics)]], aka Flint Marko * [[Captain Flint]], the legendary captain of a Pirate ship, the ''Walrus'', in the novel ''Treasure Island'' by the Scottish author Robert Louis Stevenson * Flint, the immortal antagonist in the episode ''[[Requiem for Methuselah]]'' of the original ''Star Trek'' series * Flint, the protagonist in the ''[[Cluster (novels)|Cluster]]'' series, by [[Piers Anthony]] * Flint Lockwood, the main character in ''[[Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (film)|Cloudy with a chance of Meatballs'']] *[[Flint (Pokémon)|Flint]], a character of the [[Pokémon]] universe. == Places == ;Kiribati * [[Flint Island]], an atoll in the Pacific Ocean ;United Kingdom * [[Flint, Flintshire]], a town in North Wales ** [[Flint Castle]] ;United States * [[Flint, Georgia]], an unincorporated community * [[Flint, Michigan]], a city * [[Flint Township, Michigan]], a charter township * [[Flint, New York]] * [[Flint, Texas]] *[[Flint, West Virginia]] * [[Flint Hills]], a physiographic region located in Kansas and Oklahoma * [[Flint River (disambiguation)]], several * The Flint, a neighborhood in [[Fall River, Massachusetts#Neighborhoods|Fall River, Massachusetts]] ;Fictional * [[Flint County, San Andreas]], a fictional county in ''Grand Theft Auto San Andreas'' == Materials == * [[Flint tool]], a stone tool made from flint * [[Flint glass]] * [[Ferrocerium]] or "lighter flint", a spark-producing alloy == Entertainment == * ''[[Our Man Flint]]'', a 1966 science fiction action movie * ''[[In Like Flint]]'', a 1967 sequel to the above == Other uses == * [[Flint (automobile)]], a Durant automobile from the 1920s * [[Flint (band)]] * Flint, a [[Kasakela chimpanzee community#Flint|chimpanzee]] that was featured in several books and documentaries * [[Chalicosis]], also called Flint disease * [[Flint-Worcester tornado outbreak sequence]], tornadoes in 1953 * [[SS City of Flint (1919)|SS ''City of Flint'']], first American steamship captured by Germans in WWII * [[USS Flint (CL-97)|USS ''Flint'' (CL-97)]], an Atlanta-class cruiser of the Second World War * [[Fast Library for Number Theory]], software * [[IL Flint]], Norwegian football club * {{lookfrom|flint}} * {{intitle|flint}} {{disambig|geo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Flint (Disambiguation)}}
